name: Guess you'll dieZe - GMTK Game Jam 2022
name_original: Guess you'll dieZe - GMTK Game Jam 2022
description:
A little rougue-like dungeon crawler game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

As a zombie you try to fight as many humans as possible.
Choose your dice to get the actions you need, move carefully and hope for the best!
